mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_NO , O.ORDER_SEQ , M.MENU_NO , M.MENU_NAME , O.SALE_PRICE , O.QUANTITY , O.DISCOUNT_PRICE , O.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE , O.FULL_PRICE_YN , O.FULL_PER_YN , O.SEL_PRICE_YN , O.SEL_PER_YN , O.SERVICE_YN FROM TORDER O , TMENU M WHERE O.MENU_NO = M.MENU_NO AND O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND O.TABLE_NO = #{tableNo} AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS001'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TORDER (`MENU_NO`, `SALE_PRICE`, `QUANTITY`, `DISCOUNT_PRICE`, `ORDER_DATE`, `CANCEL_DATE`, `INSERT_ID`, `INSERT_DATE`, `MODIFY_ID`, `MODIFY_DATE`, `FULL_PRICE_YN`, `FULL_PER_YN`, `SEL_PRICE_YN`, `SEL_PER_YN`, `SERVICE_YN`, `ORDER_SEQ`, `ORDER_STATUS_NO`, `TOTAL_SALE_PRICE`, `ORDER_NO`, `STORE_NO`, `TABLE_NO` ) VALUES (#{menuNo}, #{salePrice}, #{quantity}, #{discountPrice}, NOW(), NULL, #{insertId}, NOW(), #{modifyId}, NOW(), #{fullPriceYn}, #{fullPerYn}, #{selPriceYn}, #{selPerYn}, #{serviceYn}, #{orderSeq}, #{orderStatusNo}, #{totalSalePrice}, #{orderNo}, #{storeNo}, #{tableNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT O.FULL_PRICE_YN , O.FULL_PER_YN , O.SEL_PRICE_YN , O.SEL_PER_YN , O.SERVICE_YN , O.SALE_PRICE , O.QUANTITY , O.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE FROM TORDER O WHERE O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND O.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND O.TABLE_NO = #{tableNo} AND O.MENU_NO = #{menuNo} AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS001'

SELECT O.MENU_NO , O.FULL_PRICE_YN , O.FULL_PER_YN , O.SEL_PRICE_YN , O.SEL_PER_YN , O.SERVICE_YN , O.SALE_PRICE , O.QUANTITY , O.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE FROM TORDER O WHERE O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND O.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND O.TABLE_NO = #{tableNo} AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS001'
SELECT O.ORDER_NO FROM TORDER O WHERE O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} ORDER BY O.ORDER_NO DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT O.ORDER_NO , O.ORDER_SEQ , O.STORE_NO , O.TABLE_NO , O.MENU_NO , O.SALE_PRICE , O.QUANTITY , O.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE , O.ORDER_STATUS_NO , M.MENU_NAME FROM TORDER O , TMENU M WHERE O.MENU_NO = M.MENU_NO AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS001' AND M.SALE_STATUS_NO = 'SS001' AND O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo}
